content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Japanese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.

Radio cultural documentary (Selection plays one time.)
content.question: What was special about the factory when it opened?

choices.label: It was the first modern spinning mill in Japan.
It was in operation seven days a week.

content.answer: It was the first modern spinning mill in Japan.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
